IImageBase

Base interface shared across all image types

Module

import Imaging.Image.Image

Functions
GetImageType
virtual EImageType GetImageType() = 0

Returns the type of data stored in the image

GetData
virtual uint8_t* GetData() = 0

Returns a pointer to the image data

GetWidth
virtual uint32_t GetWidth() = 0

Returns the image's width in pixels

GetHeight
virtual uint32_t GetHeight() = 0

Returns the image's height in pixels

GetSubX
virtual int32_t GetSubX() = 0

Returns the X offset into our parent image (if this is a subimage)

GetSubY
virtual int32_t GetSubY() = 0

Returns the Y offset into our parent image (if this is a subimage)

GetParent
virtual CRefObj<IImageBase> GetParent() = 0

Returns the parent image. This is only not nullptr if the image is a subimage of another image.

GetBPP
virtual uint32_t GetBPP() = 0

Returns the image's bits per pixel

GetStride
virtual uint32_t GetStride() = 0

Returns the image's stride (bytes/scanline)

PeekToken
virtual LexToken PeekToken() = 0

Returns the next token without advancing the reader

ReadToken
virtual LexToken ReadToken() = 0

Returns the next token.

SetParseTable
virtual void SetParseTable(
ParseTableEntry* 
pTable
) = 0

Set the list of keywords that the parser will isolate as individual tokens.

Parameters
pTable
ParseTableEntry*

list of token strings with associated ids.
